attributes.action: Enact ‘Plan B’ to help keep people and our NHS well this winter.
attributes.additional_details:
This is about the NHS not becoming so overwhelmed with Covid that it can’t care for cancer, heart disease, surgical & all the other patients.
 
‘Plan B’ would help relieve pressure on the NHS by enacting mandatory use of masks, Covid-19 certificates and social distancing. These minor inconvenience would be significant.

Many of these measures, particularly around mask-wearing and COVID-19 certification, are already common in parts of Europe where the prevalence of the disease is lower.
attributes.background: Enact ‘Plan B’ without delay to help people and our NHS from being overwhelmed this winter. As recently outlined in a statement by ‘NHS Confederation’ The NHS is seeing worrying increases in coronavirus cases in its hospitals and the community at a time when it is preparing for a busy winter period.
